column1: Joint Damage causing Pain and Loss of Function
column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: After a variety of treatments left me with continued pain, my doctor prescribed Lodine. This medication has made a huge difference in my life. My arthritis of the hands and lower back has received relief. My knees have also shown improvement. I recommend this medication to everyone in need of improving their quality of life while living with arthritis. It's worth a try!
